title: Wahoo ELEMNT BOLT GPS strikes back w/ color screen, increased storage, USB-C charging & more
content:
Looking for a compact GPS cycling computer that’s easy to use with lots of features? Like a color screen? The newest Wahoo ELEMNT BOLT seems to qualify. When it was first launch, the BOLT was all about offering a smaller GPS computer than the larger ELEMNT. The Bolt was also designed to be aerodynamic when […]

The post Wahoo ELEMNT BOLT GPS strikes back w/ color screen, increased storage, USB-C charging & more appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
